data.title: Welcome to Official Website of GSRDC
data.text:
GOAL

Keeping in view the socio-economic scenario of the developing country of Nigerian state, GSRDC is mandated to address both agriculture and rural development. GSRDC should make "Sustainable Agriculture and Rural Development" its main goal. In line with this goal, the Organization should have its own Vision and Mission that would provide proper direction to the activities of the Organization and the results it can achieve. As a result, the Vision, Mission and Objective of GSRDC should be as follows:

OUR VISION

The Vision of GSRDC is "to improve the quality of life of the rural people in the state. Our Vision is to develop understanding among the people for better appreciation of each other's problems and to explore opportunities for collaboration of efforts for sustainable agricultural and rural and urban development.

To collaborate with the appropriate international and regional organizations, including UN agencies, the national bodies, governmental or non-governmental, both in the developed and developing countries, for purposes of taking action to accelerate agriculture and rural development in the region.

To hold international and regional conferences, seminars, workshops and meetings to facilitate exchange of ideas and experiences among the people and to identify new areas of collaboration;

To organize and facilitate the conduct of international, state and in-country training programmes to strengthen the institutional capacity of the people in sustainable agriculture and rural development and promote networking among these people through exchange of views, experiences and good practices;

To initiate research and action research studies of specific or common interest and disseminate disaggregated data/statistics and information to the people;

To provide technical and financial support to the people of the state and to undertake pilot projects for experimentation and replication;

To serve as a clearing house and data bank for communication and information on agriculture, rural and urban development and promote dissemination of such information through multi-media approach; and to pursue environment and climatic changes in the context of rural and urban development.

OUR MISSION

The Mission of GSRDC is "to catalyse efforts of the people of the state, to help them restructure their rural societies and to reconstruct the economy of their rural people, by launching concerted, and wherever possible, cooperative action with determination, by the people of the region as follows.

• Human Resource Development (HRD)

• Collaboration with International/Regional Organisations and Networking

• Meeting of Technical Programme Comittee (TPC)

• Publication and Documentation

• Development Pilot Projects

• Deputation of Experts/Consultants

• Participative Technical Cooperation Programme

• Research Studies

• Retreat for Senior Officials in-charge of

• Rural Development and Inter-Ministerial Summit

• Strengthening of Centres of Excellence
